gameBoardAnalyzerReviewLineCanBeEqualToA: No two {lines, select, rows {rows} other {columns}} can be the same
gameBoardAnalyzerReviewLineIncludesAnoth: No two {lines, select, rows {rows} other {columns}} can be the same
gameBoardAnalyzerReviewLineIsEqualToOthe: No two {lines, select, rows {rows} other {columns}} can be the same
gameBoardAnalyzerReviewLineIsFilledAndIm: There must be an equal number of cells of the same color in the {line, select, row {row} other {column}}
gameBoardAnalyzerReviewLineIsUnfilledAnd: There must be an equal number of cells of the same color in the {line, select, row {row} other {column}}
gameBoardAnalyzerReviewMiddleCellBetween: Three identical cells aren't allowed next to each other
gameBoardAnalyzerReviewNextCellAfterTwoI: Three identical cells aren't allowed next to each other
gameBoardAnalyzerReviewThreeOrMoreIdenti: Three identical cells aren't allowed next to each other
gameTutorialMessage0: Let's fill the board. Tap on the cell to make it red.
gameTutorialMessage1: Excellent! Tap twice to turn the cell blue.
gameTutorialMessage2: Three red cells next to each other in the same row aren't allowed.
gameTutorialMessage3: Never have three blue cells together in a row either.
gameTutorialMessage4: Three red or blue cells below each other isn't allowed too!
gameTutorialMessage5: There must be an equal number of red and blue cells in the row.
gameTutorialMessage6: Columns have an equal number of each color too.
gameTutorialMessage7: You should be able to know what color this one is...
gameTutorialMessage8: No two rows and no two columns can be the same.
gameTutorialMessage9: Three identical cells aren't allowed next to each other.
